caption: Figure 2: (a) Schematic results for text embeddings. (b) Statistics of the projection scalar η for three models. (c) The relationship between the original score and the two scores after decomposition using our Denscore. In the three score tables, the diagonal represents the scores for paired data, while the off-diagonal positions indicate the scores for unpaired data.
description: Figure 2 shows the schematic results of text embeddings, statistics of projection scalar for three models, and the relationship between original score and decomposed scores.

caption: Figure 4: FID and Denscore results for diffusion models with different text encodings.

caption: Figure 4: FID and Denscore results for diffusion models with different text encodings.
